teaser: Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, tells us why she hopes the stock market goes down this week.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 28, 2013
description: Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, tells us why she hopes the stock market goes down this week.
title: May markets: What goes up must come down?
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

With less than four days of trading left in May, investors are not singing the old Wall Street adage "sell in May, then go away."

"},{"content":"

Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain.

","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded:
With less than four days of trading left in May, investors are not singing the old Wall Street adage "sell in May, then go away."

Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain.
